attributes.action: Pass a law to prohibit car delivery companies from insisting that their drivers have to hitch hike to work and back home.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There are today companies making good profits from delivering and collecting cars from all over Europe. They employ drivers who carry trade plates who work from home. When given an assignment ( say perhaps to collect a car from Glasgow)they are expected to hitch hike to the collection point. It does'nt matter if it takes them 10 hours for the journey because the company only pays them a few pence per mile as expenses.
It can NOT be right fair or just to make your profits by expecting your employees to be beggars at the side of the road!
